comments_since_last_sample.body: Always amazing performance by you Violet!
It turned out very cool, the melody is not too fast, and the voice as always fantastic. I also really like the music video, maybe next time you will give Freddy Krueger a chance? ;)
Amazing cover, but.... guys... you totally blue-ballsed me on the drum fill.
Why, just why can't people stop the madness. Certain songs should never be redone unless you can do it right and this was far from it.
You can't tell me you didn't laugh making this lol this is really good though 👏
Ofg. I was just hoping one of you lovely ladies would cover this song. It’s amazing but I can’t stand Phil Collins for personal reasons

No drum breakdown, 3/10. 
But this was really cool!
Had respect for u b4 but he don’t look like that yet in the show fake a55 good bye. Hate ur with the rest I support
Is this the new Violet lore?

Great Music , Not the best Video Clip ( i dont hold anything against chucks😎 or do i?😉😁) , but Vio is always entertaning to watch  , well done , Also the Instrumental is sick thanks to Melodicka Bros ,  Well Done guy🔥♠️👌👌👌👍👍👍👏👏👏
The re-interpretation of popular songs is a pathway to many abilities some consider to be... unnatural....

wow this video was so well done that I walked outside, connected my phone to my car's speaker system via bluetooth just so I can feel that base and it's 1,000x better in my car! I never really could listen to the original version of this song all the way through but this version I couldn't get enough of! This is why I love youtube.
No one's ever wanted to be a Chucky doll more than in this video.
Hold on Chucky! You'll be fixed right up soon!
